mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.user_name, t.user_display_name, t.user_pass, t.user_email, t.user_avatar, t.user_desc, t.user_site, t.is_admin, t.email_enable, t.login_enable, t.login_last, t.login_error, t.status, t.create_time FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref r, sens_user t WHERE r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.user_id = t.id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.id DESC

SELECT t.id, t.user_name, t.user_display_name, t.user_pass, t.user_email, t.user_avatar, t.user_desc, t.user_site, t.is_admin, t.email_enable, t.login_enable, t.login_last, t.login_error, t.status, t.create_time FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref r, sens_user t WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 AND r.role_id = #{roleId} AND r.user_id = t.id
AND t.status = #{user.status}
AND t.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userName}, '%')
AND t.user_display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userDisplayName}, '%')
AND t.user_email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userEmail}, '%')
AND t.user_site LIKE CONCAT('%', #{user.userSite}, '%')
ORDER BY t.id DESC

SELECT id, user_name, user_display_name, user_pass, user_email, user_avatar, user_desc, user_site, is_admin, email_enable, login_enable, login_last, login_error, STATUS, create_time FROM sens_user WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT user_id FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref ) AND t.del_flag = 0
SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_post WHERE to_days( create_time ) = to_days( now( ) ) AND t.del_flag = 0

SELECT count( * ) postCount, u.id, u.user_name, u.user_avatar, u.user_display_name, u.login_last, u.create_time FROM sens_post p, sens_user u WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY p.user_id ORDER BY postCount DESC LIMIT #{value}
SELECT id, user_name, user_avatar, user_display_name, create_time FROM sens_user WHERE del_flag = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{value}
